title: Branding
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week scheduled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the game cell will be appropriately labeled as such (at the top of the cell)
and the label will be displayed similarly to the MLB.TV Game of the Day label text
"MLB Live on Facebook Watch"

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the MLB.TV EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the game cell will be appropriately labeled as such (under game matchup text)
and the label will be displayed similarly to the MLB.TV Game of the Day label text
"MLB Live on Facebook Watch"

title: .TV links
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week scheduled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
and expands the game cell of the Facebook Game of the Week
and the game feed is live
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a TV link for the feed
and it will be labeled "FB-WATCH"

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Team Page of a team featured in the Facebook Game of the Week
and the game feed is live
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a TV link in the schedule module's game detail section
and it will be labeled "FB-WATCH"

title: Logged in to Facebook
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week with a live feed
AND the user has the Facebook app installed
AND the user is logged into Facebook

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to the Scoreboard
and expands the game cell of the Facebook Game
and taps the "FB-WATCH" link to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where the game feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to a Team Page of a team featured in the Facebook Game
and taps the "FB-WATCH" link in the game detail section to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where the game feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to the TV EPG
and taps the Facebook Game to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where the game feed will launch

title: Not Logged in to Facebook
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week with a live feed
AND the user has the Facebook app installed
AND the user is NOT logged into Facebook

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to the Scoreboard
and expands the game cell of the Facebook Game
and taps the "FB-WATCH" link to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where they will be prompted to log in with a Facebook account

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to a Team Page of a team featured in the Facebook Game
and taps the "FB-WATCH" link in the game detail section to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where they will be prompted to log in with a Facebook account

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to the TV EPG
and taps the Facebook Game to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where they will be prompted to log in with a Facebook account

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the Facebook app
and logs in from the prompt with a Facebook account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the live game feed

title: Without Facebook Installed
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week with a live feed
AND the user DOES NOT have the Facebook app installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to the Scoreboard
and expands the game cell of the Facebook Game
and taps the "FB-WATCH" link to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview in which they can watch the game on Facebook.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to a Team Page of a team featured in the Facebook Game
and taps the "FB-WATCH" link in the game detail section to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview in which they can watch the game on Facebook.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to the TV EPG
and taps the Facebook Game to launch the game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview in which they can watch the game on Facebook.com

title: At Bat Entitlements/Blackouts
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week with a live feed
AND the user has the Facebook app installed
AND the user is logged into Facebook

custom_steps_separated.content: When a LITE user attempts to launch the Facebook Game from At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where the game feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content: When a PAID user attempts to launch the Facebook Game from At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where the game feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the Facebook Game from At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Facebook app
where the game feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user attempts to launch the Facebook Game from At Bat
and one of teams features is a local team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will not receive any sort of blackout messaging in At Bat
and will be taken to the Facebook app

title: Archives in At Bat
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there is a Facebook Game of the Week scheduled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Facebook Game is flipped to media_archive
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive will become available in the At Bat app

custom_steps_separated.content: On the TV EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the game will no longer be labeled with the Facebook-specific text
and the archive will be labeled as such, and will appear like a regular MLB.TV archive

custom_steps_separated.content: On the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the game will no longer be labeled with the Facebook-specific text

custom_steps_separated.content: On the Scoreboard expanded game cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the TV link text will change from "FB-WATCH" to "MLB.TV"

custom_steps_separated.content: On the Team Page game detail section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the TV link text will change from "FB-WATCH" to "MLB.TV"

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user attempts to launch the archive from At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the archive will follow At Bat requirements in regards to archive entitlements & blackouts:

- TV-entitled users can playback
- At Bat users will be gated by TV paywall with specific messaging
- Lite users will be gated by TV paywall
- Single Team users will only be able to view if their team had played
- No blackouts
